nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Psst… hey… wake up! Class ended like… five minutes ago.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: You sleep like a little kid. It was kinda cute.

choices.text: Why did you wake me up?
Thank you for waking me up.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Oh! I'm Aiko. We’re in the same class! Not that you ever noticed. It’s okay though. I’ve noticed you plenty.

choices.text: What do you mean by that?
Sorry, I zone out a lot.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Oh nothing! You stand out more than you think. Especially when you're asleep.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Aww, you're polite. That's adorable. I like people like you.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: It’s fine! You looked peaceful. I didn't want anyone else waking you up. Or touching you.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Because everyone else left and I didn’t want you getting locked in. I’d never leave you behind.

choices.text: Did you wait here the whole time?

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Of course! I always look out for people I care abo— I mean, classmates.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Left you? Why would I ever do that?

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Maaaaybe~ You looked peaceful. I didn't want anyone else waking you up.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: You're welcome! If you ever need anything... I'm always around. Watching. I mean— nearby!

choices.text: Why do you keep saying stuff like that?
Do you watch everyone this much?

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Because it’s true. I pay attention. Don’t you like when people care?

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Don’t say stuff like that! I’ll get the wrong idea… or the right one.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Anyway! I was hoping we could walk home together—since we’re friends now.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: I knew it. I *knew* you'd feel the same.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: Then we’ll fix that really fast.

nodes.speaker: Aiko
nodes.text: I'm very patient. You’ll come around. Everyone does.
